name: Merry Go Wrong
storyline: You're a technician tasked to repair a merry go 'round in an amusement park. However, the park's owner has become crazy and wants to run the attractions 24/7 at full speed. No time to stop for repairs so you better hurry and make sure the kids are safe!
summary: This merry go 'round is about to merry go wrong! Get in the carousel and don't fall off, try to fix the kid's rides by left clicking near them when they catch on fire and don't run out of stamina. You can refill it by left clicking while standing near the soda bar at the center of the attraction
